thread.section_title: Tractive Bewertungen | Kundenbewertungen von Tractive | tractive.com
thread.title: Jim Whiting

author: Jim Whiting
title: Jim Whiting
text:
I use Tractive GPS on three dogs and am very happy with the product. The only "complaint" I might have is lack of ability to locate my dogs in remote areas, but that is an issue with cellular service, not Tractive.
Customer service is very responsive and has always solved any issues I presented to them. At one point I lost a tracker due to a broken collar and when I purchased a replacement, they switched my account to the new tracker with no interruption in service.
For the safety of your pets, there is no better product or service. I highly recommend Tractive!
